content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

-- create taxi_zone
IF object_id('bronze.taxi_zone') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone
(
    LocationID SMALLINT,Borough VARCHAR(15),Zone VARCHAR(50),service_zone VARCHAR(15)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format,
    REJECT_VALUE=10,
    REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION='rejection/taxi_zone'
)
GO

-- create calendar
IF object_id('bronze.calendar') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar
(
    date_key INT,date DATE,year SMALLINT,month SMALLINT,day SMALLINT,
        day_name varchar(20),day_of_year SMALLINT,week_of_month SMALLINT,
        week_of_year SMALLINT,month_name VARCHAR(15),year_month INT,year_week INT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
)
GO

--create vendor
IF object_id('bronze.vendor') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor
(
    vendor_id SMALLINT,vendor_name VARCHAR(50)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/vendor.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1
)
GO
--create trip_type
IF object_id('bronze.trip_type') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type
(
    trip_type INT,trip_type_desc VARCHAR(15)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/trip_type.tsv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = tsv_file_format
)
GO
--create trip_data_green_csv
IF object_id('bronze.trip_data_green_csv') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_csv

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_csv
(
    VendorID INT,lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2,lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2,
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),RatecodeID INT,PULocationID SMALLINT,DOLocationID SMALLINT,
    passenger_count INT,trip_distance DECIMAL(5,2),fare_amount DECIMAL(5,2),extra DECIMAL(5,2) ,mta_tax DECIMAL(5,2),
    tip_amount DECIMAL(5,2),tolls_amount DECIMAL(5,2),ehail_fee DECIMAL(5,2),improvement_surcharge DECIMAL(5,2),total_amount DECIMAL(5,2),
    payment_type SMALLINT,trip_type SMALLINT,congestion_surcharge DECIMAL(5,2)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
)
GO


select top 10 * from bronze.trip_data_green_csv
